description:

We probably need to dump the notifications when this fails to help debug it.
title: TestInstanceNotificationSample.test_create_delete_server fails with MismatchError: 9 != 8

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/486301

Branch:    master

commit 246f032dc992d34e2b6781e39c803a0ce2e2eefd
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Sat Jul 22 08:14:07 2017 -0400

    Dump versioned notifications when test_create_delete_server
    
    When this test fails on a MismatchError we need to know
    which notifications we have to figure out what's missing
    in order to debug it.
    
    Change-Id: I0ec92f853f5c76737b2888cd92cf9804ca83c495
    Related-Bug: #1705818
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Here is a signature to shows the failures:
http://logstash.openstack.org/#dashboard/file/logstash.json?query=message%3A%5C%22self.assertEqual(9%2C%20len(fake_notifier.VERSIONED_NOTIFICATIONS%5C%22

There is no occurrence with the detailed log yet.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balazs-gibizer

comments.content:
Here is an occurrence of the failure with the extra logs:
http://logs.openstack.org/27/481627/2/gate/gate-nova-tox-functional-ubuntu-xenial/3562a46/console.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balazs-gibizer

comments.content: The missing notification is the instance.delete.end

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/487772

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/487772
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=ca07237167e88fb2e26de424c8a859a18552e6e3
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit ca07237167e88fb2e26de424c8a859a18552e6e3
Author: Balazs Gibizer <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jul 27 10:59:44 2017 +0200

    stabilize test_create_delete_server functional test
    
    The TestInstanceNotificationSample#test_create_delete_server functional
    test is unstable due to a race between the instance is disappering from
    the REST API after a successfull delete and the emission of
    instance.delete.end notification. This patch adds a wait for the
    delete.end notification to make the test stable.
    
    Change-Id: If03a0d264c9f054cc5482efd9f1aac8f3733947f
    Closes-Bug: #1705818
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
